value.name: Giants' Tyler Rogers: Blows save, takes win
value.description: Rogers (1-0) allowed three runs on three hits in one inning but earned the win Friday versus the Dodgers. Rogers gave up a game-tying three-run home run to Austin Barnes in the bottom of the ninth inning.

value.name: Giants' Tyler Rogers: Secures sixth save
value.description: Rogers earned the save against Arizona on Wednesday by pitching a scoreless ninth inning. He allowed three hits and struck out one. Rogers walked a high wire in the ninth frame, allowing singles to three of the first four batters he faced before striking out Ketel Marte and retiring Eduardo Escobar on a groundout.

value.name: Why Giants reliever Tyler Rogers wears those A's-reminiscent white cleats
value.description: Tyler Rogers was getting some grief on the Giants’ flagship station the other day, when KNBR’s morning duo of Murph and Mac noted that his white cleats are overly reminiscent of the A’s famous footwear.
